nodes.documentation:
Profile for resolving type of conditions required for an identity to be eligible for a role.
A role can require a combination of the types.
These possible types are:
00: The requesting identity must have some role
nodes.name: EnrolmentConditionTypeResolver
addConditionType
removeConditionType
requiresConditionType

attributes.documentation:
Profile for resolving type of conditions required for an identity to be eligible for a role.
A role can require a combination of the types.
These possible types are:
00: The requesting identity must have some role
attributes.name: EnrolmentConditionTypeResolver
addConditionType
removeConditionType
requiresConditionType

requiresConditionType(bytes32,uint256).return: Whether or not the role requires this condition

addConditionType(bytes32,uint256).notice: Adds a conditionType required for a role. If type is already required for a role, no action is taken. May only be called by the owner of that node in the ENS registry.

removeConditionType(bytes32,uint256).notice: Removes a conditionType required for a role. If type is already not required for a role, no action is taken. May only be called by the owner of that node in the ENS registry.

requiresConditionType(bytes32,uint256).notice: Returns whether or not a condition type is required for a role

userdoc.notice: Profile for resolving type of conditions required for an identity to be eligible for a role. A role can require a combination of the types. These possible types are: 00: The requesting identity must have some role
